18g PROTEIN
Mini Cheesecake

LEMON BLUEBERRY CHEESECAKE MINIS

Zesty and sweet lemon blueberry cheesecake minis, perfect for portion control.

18g
Protein
150
Calories
40m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 mini cheesecake

Carbs12g
Fat7g
Fiber2g
Sugar5g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 200g cream cheese
  • 100g plain Greek yogurt
  • 50g vanilla whey protein
  • 1 large egg
  • 1 lemon, zested and juiced
  • 50g fresh blueberries

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Preheat Oven

Preheat your oven to 175¬∞C (350¬∞F) and line a muffin tin with paper liners.

2

Mix Filling

Beat cream cheese until smooth. Mix in Greek yogurt, vanilla whey protein, egg, lemon zest, and lemon juice.

3

Fold in Blueberries

Gently fold in the fresh blueberries.

4

Fill and Bake

Divide the mixture evenly among the muffin cups and bake for 25 minutes.

5

Cool

Let the mini cheesecakes cool completely before refrigerating.

6

Serve

Serve chilled.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
